overview:
Mark is the drummer with 60s’ hit recording band Vanity Fare.

Mark teaches drums at his studio and around local schools in Kent.

He also is guitarist and shared vocalist with Country Rock duo No comebacks. Mark restores vintage drums and owns / operates a recording studio. Ocean Records.

When not doing music mark is involved in local politics. He is branch secretary of the Labour Party in Sheerness, Kent, UK and serves as a Borough Councillor on Swale Borough Council.
